node.detail_zh: 患者於麗豪航天城酒店地盤工作，無外遊紀錄，7 月 22 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient works at the Regal SkyCity Hotel construction site, has no recent travel history, and developed symptoms on July 22.

groups.name_zh: 赤鱲角麗豪航天城酒店地盤
groups.name_en: Regala Skycity Hotel Construction Site, Chek Lap Kok
groups.description_zh: 赤鱲角麗豪航天城酒店地盤 3 名建築工人及其家人確診，3 人主要負責有關項目之 3 至 12 樓客房層裝修裝修。
groups.description_en: Three construction workers at the Regala Skycity Hotel Construction Site in Chek Lap Kok and their family members were tested positive. The three were primarily tasked with construction of the guest rooms on the 3rd to 12th floors.

node.location_en: Choi Lok House, Choi Fook Estate
